Plot: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.
Title: The General's Daughter
Writer: Nelson DeMille (novel), Christopher Bertolini (screenplay), William Goldman (screenplay)
Actors: John Travolta, Madeleine Stowe, James Cromwell, Timothy Hutton
